Transportation is an integral part of urban living. Get train and bus times, maps, and real-time arrival information with ease so that you can plan your trip with confidence. Pay and validate your rides. ► Real-time arrivals. View real-time arrival information, which is taken directly from GPS devices positioned on buses and trains. Avoid wasting time guessing train times or bus times.

summary.label:
Muslim prayer direction and timings calculator with mosque locator and prayer alarm.

--- Qiblah Direction ---
SalahForFalah is a simple and convenient tool for Muslims to determine prayer timings and Qiblah direction* from their current location. The user-interface is designed to be unobtrusive and without distractions, so the focus remains on prayer timing and direction.

Wherever** they are, SalahForFalah automatically determines the location of users and calculates the prayer timings, based on the preferences set. It then guides the users to rotate the mobile device until it aligns itself with the direction of the Qiblah at their location.

A user-friendly color-coded compass ring indicates how far away is the device from the direction of the Qiblah. Further away is indicated by dark grey, while the color fades into shades of Green as the device is rotated to point to the Qiblah. The color-coded ring then becomes bright Green to indicate a lock-on with the Qiblah direction.

--- Prayer Timings ---
Prayer timings are available on the same screen as the Qiblah direction for ease of use and ready reference. Time for sunrise is also indicated to mark end of time for the morning prayers. A current-prayer-bar indicates which prayer should currently be offered.

--- Hijri Calendar ---
Users have the option to display dates using either the Hijri or the Gregorian calendar.

--- Mosque Locator ---
A simple mosque locator searches for all mosques in the vicinity and displays them on a map. A location search capability allows searching for locations and the mosques in their vicinity, and bookmarking them for easy lookup.

--- Prayer Alarms (Available Via In-App Purchase) ---
An elegant Alarms feature allows setting of alarms for each prayer. A separate alarm can be set for the Friday prayer, which will alert user for Friday prayer time instead of Zuhr on that day.

Alarm for each prayer can be set either for an exact time or relative to the prayer start time. For example, a user would want to the set alarm for Zuhr prayer for a fixed time, if Zuhr prayer is offered at the same time each day.

But for Maghrib prayer, users would want to set the alarm relative to the Maghrib prayer start time. The Alarms feature lets user set alarms relative to start time of a prayer. The alarm time then changes every day with the change in the time of prayer.

--- Voluntary Fasting Alarms (Included with the Prayer Alarm In-App Purchase) ---
Fasting Alarms can be enabled in preferences. Once enabled, alarm will sound a specified number of hours before Fajr prayer. Alarms are set for all Mondays and Thursdays except in Ramadan, 13-15 of each lunar month except Ramadan, 9 and 10 of Muharram, and 1-9 of Dhu al-Hijja. No alarms are set for 1 Shawal and 10-13 Dhu al-Hijja.

* Qiblah direction is only supported on devices that have a built-in compass. For devices without a compass, the SalahForFalah compass ring can be used to determine the Qiblah direction in conjunction with an external compass.

Live flight tracker app: It has never been so easy to track flights! Do you just want to watch which planes are currently flying above your house or do you want to know where the flight from your friends, family or business contacts is now? Do this easily with this flight status tracker. This app allows locating and tracking flights – whether domestic or international, short or long – all this is live and free.

Using this flight radar is very simple. Search for a flight by entering the flight number or by using the flight tracking map and selecting the plane. You will then be shown various details about this plane and its current route.

Available plane details:
-aircraft type and photos
-airline and flight number
-flight origin and destination airports
-departure and arrival time
-altitude, speed and heading
-signal source and accuracy

This live flight radar app also contains an airport map. With this map you can find out the most important information about large and small airports from all over the world with just one click.

A compass is also integrated into this tracking app. This easy-to-use compass helps you to determine your own current position and thus helps you spotting planes with the flight radar map around your current location.

Flight tracking is exciting for several reasons. As an aviation fan, you can track flights just with one free flight radar app from your smartphone or tablet. You get more information about the current flight status than at the airport. If your friends or family are on a plane, you can easily track their flight online in real time. The practical thing is that this easy flight tracker app helps you get to the airport in time should a flight landed earlier or be delayed.

Are you wondering how it is possible that all this information appears live on your smartphone or tablet? Most modern aircraft have an ADS-B (Automatic Dependent Surveillance Broadcast) transponder installed. This transponder then transmits the air traffic information to a network of ground stations around the world, so that you can see the exact current flight position and details about the aircraft.

Download the free flight tracker app now!
